name: Treasure Hunter Leviathan Ship
text:
3 Level 6 Explorer Monsters
This card can also be Xyz Summoned by using another Explorer Xyz monster (transfer its materials to this card). Once per turn (Quick Effect) detach 1 Xyz material from this card: you can target monsters up to the number of Xyz materials this card has; destroy those monsters, then this card gains 800 ATK for each monster destroyed. You can only Summon "Treasure Hunter Leviathan Ship" once per turn.
